[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.md) &gt; [ICspConfig](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icspconfig.md)

## ICspConfig interface

CSP configuration for use in OpenSearchDashboards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICspConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [header](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icspconfig.header.md) | <code>string</code> | The CSP rules in a formatted directives string for use in a <code>Content-Security-Policy</code> header. |
|  [rules](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icspconfig.rules.md) | <code>string[]</code> | The CSP rules used for OpenSearchDashboards. |
|  [strict](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icspconfig.strict.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Specify whether browsers that do not support CSP should be able to use OpenSearchDashboards. Use <code>true</code> to block and <code>false</code> to allow. |
|  [warnLegacyBrowsers](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icspconfig.warnlegacybrowsers.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Specify whether users with legacy browsers should be warned about their lack of OpenSearchDashboards security compliance. |
